item.title: Stupid OpenStack Tricks
item.description: I work with several different OpenStack installations. I usually work on the command line, sourcing in an appropriate stackrc with credentials as necessary, but occasionally I want to use the dashboard for something. For all of the deployments with which I work, the keystone endpoint is on the same host as the dashboard. So rather than trying to remember which dashboard url I want for the environment I’m currently using on the command line, I put together this shell script:
